function getConfig(name){let defaultValue=arguments.length>1&&arguments[1]!==undefined?arguments[1]:null;// If inside a docker container, use window.ENV
if(window.ENV!==undefined){return window.ENV[name]||defaultValue;}return process.env[name]||defaultValue;}export function getBackendUrl(){return getConfig('REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL');}export function getHoursCloseTicketsAuto(){return getConfig('REACT_APP_HOURS_CLOSE_TICKETS_AUTO');}
